com.camerontec.catalys.util.text

Class InternalTextConversionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.text.InternalTextConversionUtil
  • Deprecated. 
    Use AsciiTextConversionUtils instead.

    public final class InternalTextConversionUtil
extends Object
    Some utilities for handling text. Note: as the name implies this utility class is intended for internal Orc Catalys use. 3rd parties should not rely on the functionality or interface offered by this class.

    • Method Detail

      • bytesToAsciiString

        public static String bytesToAsciiString(BytesSegment segment)
        Deprecated. 
        Converts bytes to a String, assuming that the bytes are ASCII characters.

        This is an alternative to simply creating a String object from the bytes 

         new String(bs.getBytes(), bs.start, bs.length);
        Parameters:
        segment - Bytes representing an ASCII string.
        Returns:
        An equivalent String object, or null if bytes is null.

      • bytesToAsciiString

        public static String bytesToAsciiString(byte[] bytes)
        Deprecated. 
        Converts a byte array to a String, assuming that the bytes are ASCII characters.

        Parameters:
        bytes - Byte array representing an ASCII string.
        Returns:
        An equivalent String object, or null if bytes is null.

      • byteToAsciiString

        public static String byteToAsciiString(byte b)
        Deprecated. 

      • toAsciiBytes

        public static byte[] toAsciiBytes(String text)
        Deprecated. 
        Converts an ASCII String to a byte array.
        Parameters:
        text - String to convert
        Returns:
        The ASCII bytes
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the US-ASCII charset is not supported in your JVM. Should never happen.

      • capitalize

        public static String capitalize(String input)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a String which is the input string with the first character capitalized.
        Parameters:
        input - Input string to be capitalized.
        Returns:
        Capitalized string.
